Text: is it really 720p? i hate waiting long to download movies to find out that it's in low quality.

@isaacteo it probably is 720p, however that doesn't make it good quality necessarily. What is equally important to resolution is bit-rate, ie. how much data is saved per second. With 720p resolution and 650MB size I cannot expect the bit-rate to be very high, meaning the quality most likely isn't that great. However it might be very compressed and still have decent quality.
